---
title: Student advising booklet for environmental education at Rice
date: 2023-08-14
categories: Announcements
---

A new student advising [booklet](https://trei.rice.edu/education){target=_blank} for environmental education at Rice has been published.
This booklet seeks to provide a comprehensive overview of the environmental education opportunities *for undergraduates* at Rice, including courses, minors, and certificates.

Thanks to all who contributed to this effort, and especially to [Dr. Sylvia Dee](https://profiles.rice.edu/faculty/sylvia-dee){target=_blank} for leading the effort.
